column1: #Text=Bato says : " After I was wounded , your father carried me to this abbey .
#Text=" Aang says : " Thank you , it 's truly an honor to be here .
#Text=If there 's anything - " Sokka says : " What smells so good , Bato ?
#Text=" Bato says : " The sisters craft ointments and perfumes .
#Text=Maybe we can dump some on Appa , because he stinks so much .
#Text=" Bato says : " You have your father 's wit .
